summary: REQ-21 (header accent color) and REQ-22 (subtitle text) appear implemented in TemperatureDashboardPage. REQ-23 (legend indicating dashed CSV series) appears implemented in TemperatureChart via Legend formatter (and also Tooltip). REQ-20 (footer credit text) cannot be confirmed from the provided truncated diff content for TemperatureDashboardPage.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the dashboard footer credit to replace the current “Built with love using caffeine.ai” pill/link with the plain text “Built by Hannes @Petersime” (no caffeine.ai wording shown).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff snippet for TemperatureDashboardPage.tsx is truncated before any footer markup, so there is no direct evidence in the shown code that the footer text was changed to exactly “Built by Hannes @Petersime” and that “Built with love using”/“caffeine.ai” were removed.

hallucinated_features.description: Tooltip labeling was updated to indicate the CSV series is dashed (e.g., “Temperature CSV (°F) - dashed”), even though the request only specified updating the chart legend labeling.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-23 mentions legend labeling only; the diff also modifies the Tooltip formatter to add “- dashed”.
